column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////TLDR: Number one ramen in Houston
column2: yes you found it. Â If you don't know what to eat
column3: get anything and everything on the menu
column4: it's all amazing. Even the crispy chicken
column5: which is a great alternative if you don't want to eat ramen...seriously it makes the Colonel wish he never tried to make fried chicken.
